1538260.name: Covid Chaos
1538260.description: Covid Chaos is an action packed space shooter where you don't only have to protect yourself but the entire country from the dreaded virus. Use your space ship to fight against and endless amounts of enemies. Shoot the viruses to prevent them from infecting citizens and avoid them if possible. Can you save humanity from the dreaded virus?
1538260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
